snippet: Three juniors at the Bronx High School of Science face misdemeanor charges of forcible touching and assault in a case involving a freshman on the boys’ track team.
abstract: Students at the Bronx High School of Science are in debate over whether horseplay on boys' track team went too far, after authorities reveal three members of team have been arrested on misdemeanor charges of assault and charges of second-degree hazing and harassment; athletic director Marion Dietrich and coaches Aisha Bruce and Cesar Gracia have been suspended.

byline.contributor: Nate Schweber, Michael Schwirtz and Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Three juniors at the Bronx High School of Science face misdemeanor charges of forcible touching and assault in a case involving a freshman on the boys’ track team.

headline.seo: Bronx High School of Science Debates Hazing After Arrests
headline.main: Hazing Arrests Prompt a Debate Over Student Conduct at Bronx Science
headline.print_headline: Hazing Arrests Prompt a Debate Over Student Conduct at Bronx Science
